edu.illinois.i3.htrc.registry.api.workset

Interface WorksetAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WorksetAPIImpl

    @Produces(value={"application/vnd.htrc-workset+xml","application/vnd.htrc-workset+json","application/xml","application/json"})
public interface WorksetAPI
    JAX-RS Interface for managing Workset
    Author:
    capitanu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteWorkset()
      DELETE: Delete a workset
      TagsAPI getTagsAPI()
      Get access to the API for managing this workset's tags
      VolumesAPI getVolumesAPI()
      Get access to the API for managing this workset's volumes
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getWorkset(String author)
      GET: Retrieve a workset
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateWorkset(Workset workset, boolean isPublic)
      PUT: Update/replace a workset

    • Method Detail

      • getWorkset

        @GET
javax.ws.rs.core.Response getWorkset(@QueryParam(value="author")
                                          String author)
        GET: Retrieve a workset
        Parameters:
        author - The workset author, or null to use current user
        Returns:
        The retrieved workset

      • updateWorkset

        @PUT
 @Consumes(value={"application/vnd.htrc-workset+xml","application/vnd.htrc-workset+json"})
javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateWorkset(Workset workset,
                                                                                                                                        @DefaultValue(value="false") @QueryParam(value="public")
                                                                                                                                        boolean isPublic)
        PUT: Update/replace a workset
        Parameters:
        workset - The new workset
        isPublic - True to mark this workset as "public" (shared with everyone), False otherwise
        Returns:
        200 if successful, error otherwise

      • deleteWorkset

        @DELETE
 @Produces(value="*/*")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteWorkset()
        DELETE: Delete a workset
        Returns:
        204 if successful, error otherwise

      • getVolumesAPI

        @Path(value="/volumes")
VolumesAPI getVolumesAPI()
        Get access to the API for managing this workset's volumes
        Returns:
        The VolumesAPI

      • getTagsAPI

        @Path(value="/tags")
TagsAPI getTagsAPI()
        Get access to the API for managing this workset's tags
        Returns:
        The TagsAPI
